context: When user reports issue that seems to be in one repo but is actually in another
lesson: User initially referenced 'self repo' and 'ixcoach-landing', but actual issue was in auth3.1 repo. Console logs showing localhost:5982 were key indicator. Auth3.1 runs on 5982, ixcoach-landing on 3005, self/Coherence on 5678. Always verify which repo user is actually working in based on port numbers in error logs.
